entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:14 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 11:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -37.3°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -41.5°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
